title: Lamb kebabs with fig rice
ingredients: ['3 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', 'grated zest and juice of 1/2 lemon', '1 large garlic clove, crushed', '1 tbsp chopped fresh thyme', '400 g (14 oz) lean lamb neck fillets, trimmed of fat and cut into 5 mm (1/4 in) cubes', '8 shallots', '1 aubergine, about 280 g (10 oz)', '2 courgettes, about 400 g (14 oz) in total', '1 lemon', 'salt and pepper', 'Fig rice', '300 g (10½ oz) basmati rice, well rinsed', '100 g (3½ oz) dried figs, chopped', '25 g (scant 1 oz) toasted flaked almonds', '1 tbsp lemon juice, or to taste']
